A

addSolution(Move) - Static method in class nl.vu.pp.sequential.FifteenPuzzle
When the IDA* algorithm as implemented in the Job class finds a solution, this method is invoked together with the move that solved the game (note that every Move includes its parent move).
addSolution(Move) - Static method in class nl.vu.pp.multithreaded.FifteenPuzzle
When the IDA* algorithm as implemented in the Job class finds a solution, this method is invoked together with the move that solved the game (note that every Move includes its parent move).

I

idle() - Method in class nl.vu.pp.distributed.JobManagerImpl
When a worker process is out of jobs and the manager's get() method throws the OutOfWorkException to indicate no new jobs will come available, the worker invokes this method that acts as a barrier to synchronize all threads and detect termination of the algorithm.
idle() - Method in interface nl.vu.pp.distributed.JobManager
When a worker process is out of jobs and the manager's get() method throws the OutOfWorkException to indicate no new jobs will come available, the worker invokes this method that acts as a barrier to synchronize all threads and detect termination of the algorithm.
instance() - Static method in class nl.vu.pp.distributed.JobManagerImpl
Use this factory method to obtain a reference to the central job manager.

J

Job - class nl.vu.pp.sequential.Job.
The Job class implements the Iterative Deepening A-Star (IDA*) algorithm [Korf, 1985] to solve the 15-puzzle.
Job - class nl.vu.pp.multithreaded.Job.
 
Job - class nl.vu.pp.distributed.Job.
 
Job(int[][], int[][], int) - Constructor for class nl.vu.pp.sequential.Job
Used to create the initial (root) job from which the IDA* algorithm is run and the game tree is unfolded.

Job(int[][], int[][], int) - Constructor for class nl.vu.pp.distributed.Job

OutOfWorkException - exception nl.vu.pp.distributed.OutOfWorkException.
This RuntimeException is thrown by the central JobManager's get() method when both the manager's internal job queue is empty and closed for new input.

Worker - class nl.vu.pp.multithreaded.Worker.
This is the worker thread that takes parts of the game tree from the central job queue and solves them in parallel with other workers.
Worker - interface nl.vu.pp.distributed.Worker.
 
Worker(String, JobQueue) - Constructor for class nl.vu.pp.multithreaded.Worker
Creates and starts a new worker thread with the given name and associated job queue.
WorkerImpl - class nl.vu.pp.distributed.WorkerImpl.
WorkerImpl(int, int) - Constructor for class nl.vu.pp.distributed.WorkerImpl
At construction, a worker instance obtains a reference to the local or remote JobManager, registers itself in the RMI registry running at the master process and passes an RMI stub to itself to the (possibly remote) JobManager.
